summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness against the general fund of the City of Seattle, for the purpose of repairing the bridge at 12th Avenue South over Dearborn Street; restoring street car and other traffic from said bridge to 12th Avenue South and Judkins Street; sinking test pits; constructing drainage tunnels and doing other necessary work in connection therewith; and appropriating money therefor, and declaring an emergency.
